text: Huge pothole just opened up on Main Street near the library entrance! Nearly lost a tire.
Anyone else notice how bad Elm Street is getting? It's a minefield.
Just wanted to share a picture of my cat. Isn't he cute?
Watch out for the crater at the corner of Oak and Pine Ave. City needs to fix this ASAP.
There's a really bad dip on Route 6 near the ESPN entrance in Bristol. Be careful!
